Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) and grease an 8-inch round glass baking dish.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9-inch round baking pan.
Bake in the oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, approximately 50 minutes.
